review.title: “A job for the young”
review.pros: Pros – Its great pay for the type of work. Its pretty easy and mindless! Customers are nice for the most part. A good job for high school or college students. Hours and shifts are very flexible.
review.cons: Cons – Very unprofessional! Too much drama! Employees are allowed too much freedom and are too trusted! No proper reprocussions for bad choices ( being rude to customers, and treating fellow employees with disrespect). There is just no professionalism.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need proper rules set in place for employee conduct.
